text: allaah ki jisake siva koee poojy-prabhu nahin, vah jeevant-satta hai, sabako sanbhaalane aur qaayam rakhanevaala hai. use na oongh lagatee hai aur na nidra. usee ka hai jo kuchh aakaashon mein hai aur jo kuchh dharatee mein hai. kaun hai jo usake yahaan usakee anumati ke bina sifaarish kar sake? vah jaanata hai jo kuchh unake aage hai aur jo kuchh unake peechhe hai. aur ve usake gyaan mein se kisee cheez par haavee nahin ho sakate, sivaay usake jo usane chaaha. usakee kursee (prabhuta) aakaashon aur dharatee ko vyaapt hai aur unakee suraksha usake lie tanik bhee bhaaree nahin aur vah uchch, mahaan hai
